title: Project,ciboria, 1920–25
medium: Pencil, white heightening, dark purple watercolor, creamy paper
description: In Gothic shape. Angular foot and shaft, the latter with arcades. A band on which rosettes with diamonds alternate with small diamonds around the knob. Leaf calyx at the bottom of the cup-like box. Gems at the bottom part of the cover, which tapers to a calyx from which a mound rises. Bordering line as -20.

tombstone.epitaph: Project,ciboria, 1920–25.Pencil, white heightening, dark purple watercolor, creamy paper. 1939-84-46-a.
